replies.body:
Hey everyone, just would like to say again, a big thank you for my welcoming back! It means a lot :) And no, I didn't forget about Avicus. To everyone I have never met before, Hello there, and nice meeting you!

Merci (pour la 4ieme fois) a tout le monde! And yes, I do speak french <3 Hope to see everyone ingame!
